member.name: WS_CERT_MESSAGE_SECURITY_BINDING_CONSTRAINT
member.summary: A security binding constraint that can be used with.

summary.para: The base binding constraint that this binding constraint derives from.
There are currently no binding-specific properties defined for this binding constraint.

member.name: WS_CERT_MESSAGE_SECURITY_BINDING_CONSTRAINT.bindingUsage
member.summary: This specifies how the security token corresponding to this security binding should be attached to a message.
